Episodes.Title: ... Or Die Trying
Episodes.Plot: Granddad, Huey, Riley and Jazmine must avoid guards after they sneak in to a theatre to watch Soul Plane 2: The Blackjacking.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Tom, Sarah and Usher
Episodes.Plot: While on a date with Tom Dubois, Sarah Dubois meets the singing sensation, Usher. Sarah starts being obsessed with Usher, and Tom begins to think Sarah is cheating on him. Sarah kicks Tom out of the house and Tom moves in with the Freemans. A pimp Named Slick Back returns in this episode to try to help Tom get Sarah back.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Thank You for Not Snitching
Episodes.Plot: Two men are invading homes, and Riley and Granddad are refusing to speak to the police. It gets worse when Granddad's car, Dorothy, gets stolen by the robbers. If Riley and Granddad still refuse, worse things may be in store.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Stinkmeaner Strikes Back
Episodes.Plot: Huey has a dream of Stinkmeaner and Granddad says that he was a menace and he sent him to hell like he deserves. Stinkmeaner's spirit later inhabits Tom Dubois' body and goes looking for revenge against Granddad. Huey must stop him from killing Granddad.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jim Meskiman, Terry Crews, Kevin Michael Richardson

Episodes.Title: The Story of Thugnificent
Episodes.Plot: The infamous rapper Thugnificent moves to the neighbourhood with his friends Macktastic and Flonominal, eventually leading to Granddad becoming annoyed with his new neighbours. Their feud inspires Thugnificent to create a diss-track called "Eff Granddad".
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Attack of the Killer Kung-Fu Wolf Bitch
Episodes.Plot: After many failed attempts at online dating, Granddad finally meets a beautiful woman named Luna? who just happens to be a psycho.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Shinin'
Episodes.Plot: Riley joins Thugnificent's Lethal Injection crew. Meanwhile, a local bully steals Riley's prized chain.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Ballin'
Episodes.Plot: Riley learns a lesson in good sportsmanship after he joins a basketball team.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.Writer: Aaron McGruder, Andre Brooks, Jason Van Veen

Episodes.Title: Invasion of the Katrinians
Episodes.Plot: Jericho Freeman, Granddad's cousin, and his family, who were displaced by Hurricane Katrina, arrive at the Freeman's home looking for a place to stay. Granddad reluctantly allows the family to stay, but is soon trying to get rid of them.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Lil' Wayne, Cedric the Entertainer, DeRay Davis, Jamai Fisher, Vernee Watson, Rob Paulsen

Episodes.Title: Home Alone
Episodes.Plot: Granddad takes a vacation, leaving the boys alone, but just who is in charge?
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Maria Canals-Barrera, Carl Jones, Kittie, Miguel Sandoval, Tara Strong

Episodes.Title: The S Word
Episodes.Plot: A teacher calls Riley a "nigga" in class, causing Robert to decide that he wants to sue for restitution.
Episodes.GuestStars: Decarlo 'Cee-Lo' Callaway, Fred Willard, Rodney Barnes, Maurice LaMarche, Jim Meskimen, Tress MacNeille, Kevin Michael Richardson, Marion Ross

Episodes.Title: The Story of Catcher Freeman
Episodes.Plot: Huey and Riley listen to different perspectives on the story of their ancestor Catcher Freeman.

Episodes.Title: The Story of Gangstalicious Part 2
Episodes.Plot: Granddad worries about Riley's sexuality when he notices that he begins to dress and act like "in-the-closet" rapper, Gangstalicious.

Episodes.Plot: Huey goes on a hunger strike in a boycott of BET, and receives some high-profile support.
